Comment[GEAAccession]	E-GEAD-1057
MAGE-TAB Version	1.1
Investigation Title	Spatial transcriptome analysis of salivaryglands from sjogren syndrome patients
Experiment Description	6 minor salivary glands were obtained from sjogren patients. Specimens from minor salivary glands were processed into FFPE blocks and mounted as 5 micro meter slices and subjected to spatial transcriptome analysis using Vizgen MERSCOPE platform.
Experimental Design	disease state design
Experimental Factor Name	disease_condition
Experimental Factor Type	disease_condition
Person Last Name	Nishimura
Person First Name	Kei
Person Affiliation	Center of Medical Innovation and Translational Research, Department of Advanced Clinical and Translational Immunology, Osaka University
Person Roles	submitter
Public Release Date	2025-04-30
Protocol Name	P-GEAD-4697	P-GEAD-4698	P-GEAD-4699	P-GEAD-4700	P-GEAD-4701	P-GEAD-4702
Protocol Type	sample collection protocol	nucleic acid extraction protocol	nucleic acid labeling protocol	nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol	array scanning and feature extraction protocol	normalization data transformation protocol
Protocol Description	FFPE specimens from minor salivary glands were processed into FFPE blocks and mounted as 5 micro meter slices and subjected to spatial transcriptome analysis.	As per Vizgen MERSCOPE protocol	As per Vizgen MERSCOPE protocol	As per Vizgen MERSCOPE protocol	dummy	No data transformation. expression matrix were obtained using Vizgen MERSCOPE software with custom gene panel from Vizgen gene panel design portal Ser.Number : AP1505.
SDRF File	E-GEAD-1057.sdrf.txt
Comment[Number of channel]	single-channel
Comment[Array Design REF]	A-GEAD-11
Comment[AEExperimentType]	transcription profiling by array
Comment[BioProject]	PRJDB20526
Comment[Last Update Date]	2025-04-30
